_header: When pride is most in prize
_description: On the Abuses of the Age — five lines (aaabb)

BLRoy17Bxvii.Transcription:
When pride is most in priseAnd couertis most wyse& lecherye
                    moste in vseThout made reneÞen scall england my…

BLAdd8151.Transcription:
Whene pryde is moste in prysAnde couetyse moste wysAnde luchery
                    moste in vse þefe maade reneþene schall englonde mys
                    chewe
BLAdd8151.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Queene Elizabethes Achademy, etc.
